thread.title: T.J. McDonald Reportedly Suspended 8 Games by NFL Stemming from May Arrest
thread.title_full: T.J. McDonald Reportedly Suspended 8 Games by NFL Stemming from May Arrest

author: Tyler Conway
title: T.J. McDonald Reportedly Suspended 8 Games by NFL Stemming from May Arrest
text: T.J. McDonald Reportedly Suspended 8 Games by NFL Stemming from May Arrest Harry How/Getty Images Tyler Conway Featured Columnist March 29, 2017 Free-agent safety T.J. McDonald was suspended for the first eight games of the 2017 NFL season Wednesday as punishment for a May 2016 arrest on DUI and drug charges. Ian Rapoport of NFL Network reported the news. McDonald, 26, spent his first four NFL seasons with the Rams . He recorded 64 tackles and two interceptions in 2016, playing in all 16 games. More to follow.
